name: BlueBox
description: This blue box was carved from the scales of blue dragons found west of Black Knights Fortress.

name: GreenDragon
description: This blue box was carved from the blue scales of blue dragons found west of Black Knights Fortress.

name: Pink Girl
description: Lives in this room, convinced herself she is a red box.  Never moves. Never breathes. Always staring.

name: Pink Girl's lack of fun...
description: Pink Girl has no sense of humor and must be exterminated.
